title: Dashboard
description: Welcome to your dashboard. This is a protected page that requires authentication.

admin.title: Admin workspace
admin.description: Manage events and users with elevated permissions.
admin.staffDescription: Staff access with limited admin capabilities.

users.title: User management
users.description: Manage administrators, staff, race directors, and athletes.
users.placeholder: User management tools will appear here.

tools.title: Staff tools
tools.description: Operational utilities and event management shortcuts.
tools.placeholder: Staff tools will be available soon.

metrics.sectionDescription: High-level signals for how RunGoMX is being used.

users.title: User signups
users.description: New accounts created across the platform.

profiles.title: Profiles created
profiles.description: Athlete and race director profiles with details filled in.
profiles.completionLabel: {rate, number} % of users with a profile

contactSubmissions.title: Feedback activity
contactSubmissions.description: Feedback submitted from the in-app dialog.

registrationsByRole.title: Registrations by role
registrationsByRole.description: Breakdown of new signups by external role in the selected period.

operations.feedbackRateDescription: How often users send feedback in the selected period.
operations.feedbackRateLabel: Feedback entries relative to total users

events.title: Events
events.description: Manage your events and race registrations.

metadata.title: Events | RunGoMX
metadata.description: Manage your events and race registrations on RunGoMX.

events.comingSoon: Events management is coming soon. This feature is currently under development.

emptyState.title: No events yet
emptyState.description: Create your first event to start managing registrations.

createEvent.title: Create event
createEvent.description: Set up a new event for your organization.

organization.title: Select organization
organization.description: Choose the organization that will host this event, or create a new one.

detail.manageEventDescription: Edit event details, dates, and registration settings
detail.manageFaqDescription: Add and edit frequently asked questions
detail.viewPublicPageDescription: See how your event appears to participants
detail.noDistances: No distances added yet. Go to settings to add distances.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Add questions and answers that will be displayed on your event page.
faq.emptyState: No FAQ items yet. Add your first question to help participants understand your event.

settings.title: Event Settings
settings.description: Configure your event details, visibility, distances, and registration settings.

visibility.title: Event Visibility
visibility.description: Control who can see and access your event. Published events appear in the public directory.

registration.title: Registration Status
registration.description: Pause or resume registration for this event. Paused events won't accept new registrations.

distances.title: Distances
distances.empty: No distances added yet. Add your first distance to enable registration.
distances.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this distance? This action cannot be undone.
